### executeObjcopyOnBinary() {#ae6098aac8d9341369e7479af43f3d1c2}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>Error llvm::objcopy::wasm::executeObjcopyOnBinary (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/objcopy/commonconfig">CommonConfig</a> &amp; Config, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/objcopy/wasmconfig">WasmConfig</a> &amp;, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/object/wasmobjectfile">object::WasmObjectFile</a> &amp; In, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/raw-ostream">raw&#95;ostream</a> &amp; Out)</>}>

any <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/error">Error</a> encountered whilst performing the operation.
</SectionUser>
